subject: Re: [Wolf IQ] Your Site is Experiencing a Technical Issue

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: @heath @andy @manuel All good on this one.

@manuel - can you take care of this?

Thank you

Hi Andy,

This can be passed to support. heath@wolfiq.com.au must be the
administrator contact on the wolfiq.com.au WordPress install. This should
be changed to support@.

Cheers,

Heath

On Fri, Mar 7, 2025 at 10:50 PM Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Is this something we can unsubscribe or pass to support?

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Wolf IQ <team@wolfiq.com.au>
Date: Fri, Mar 7, 2025 at 5:28 PM
Subject: [Wolf IQ] Your Site is Experiencing a Technical Issue
To: <heath@wolfiq.com.au>


G'day!

Since WordPress 5.2 there is a built-in feature that detects when a plugin
or theme causes a fatal error on your site, and notifies you with this
automated email.

In this case, WordPress caught an error with one of your plugins,
JetSmartFilters.

First, visit your website (https://wolfiq.com.au/) and check for any
visible issues. Next, visit the page where the error was caught (
https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-admin/?elementor_updater=continue&_wpnonce=31a7765060)
and check for any visible issues.

Please contact your host for assistance with investigating this issue
further.

If your site appears broken and you can't access your dashboard normally,
WordPress now has a special "recovery mode". This lets you safely login to
your dashboard and investigate further.


https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-login.php?action=enter_recovery_mode&rm_token=478IB9D5KWCEORQ0Qgf2IY&rm_key=Y3zLerqaN0fMOpK0MvjFKD

To keep your site safe, this link will expire in 1 day. Don't worry about
that, though: a new link will be emailed to you if the error occurs again
after it expires.

When seeking help with this issue, you may be asked for some of the
following information:
WordPress version 6.4.3
Active theme: Hello Elementor Child (version 1.0.1)
Current plugin: JetSmartFilters (version 3.3.2)
PHP version 8.2.25



Error Details
=============
